Function getCardExpiry Returns Char ():

   Def Var v-expiry As Char No-Undo.

   /*****************/

   If not v-account then
   Do:
      v-expiry = v-expiry + ' <select  name="expMonth" tabindex="3">~n'.

      Do i = 1 To 12:
         v-expiry = v-expiry +
            '  <option value="' + String(i) + '"'.

         If Available credit-card Then
         Do:
            If Int( Substring(credit-card.card-expiry-date, 1, 2) ) Eq i Then
            v-expiry = v-expiry + ' selected'.
         End.
         Else If Int(v-exp-month) Eq i Then
         v-expiry = v-expiry + ' selected'.

         v-expiry = v-expiry + '>'.

         If i Lt 10 Then
            v-expiry = v-expiry + '0' + String(i).
         Else
            v-expiry = v-expiry + String(i).

         v-expiry = v-expiry + '</option>~n'.
      End.

      v-expiry = v-expiry + ' </select>~n' +
          '&nbsp~;/&nbsp~;~n' +
          ' <select  name="expYear" tabindex="4">~n'.

      Do i = Year(Today) To ( Year(Today) + 9 ): /* 010001 */
         v-expiry = v-expiry +
            '  <option value="' + String(i) + '"'.

         If Available credit-card Then
         Do:
            If Int(Substring(credit-card.card-expiry-date, 3)) Eq i Then
            v-expiry = v-expiry + ' selected'.
         End.
         Else If Int(v-exp-year) Eq i Then
         v-expiry = v-expiry + ' selected'.

         v-expiry = v-expiry + '>' + String(i) + '</option>~n'.
      End.

      v-expiry = v-expiry + ' </select>~n'.
   End.

   Return v-expiry.

End Function. /* getCardExpiryMonth() */

Function getBankName Returns Char ():

   Return '<INPUT TYPE="TEXT" CLASS="txtField" NAME="bankname" SIZE="20" MAXLENGTH="35" VALUE="' + v-bank-name + '" ' + v-disabled + ' tabindex="5">'. /* 010001 */

End Function. /* getCardExpiryYear() */

Function getCardName Returns Char ():

   If Available credit-card Then
      Return '<INPUT TYPE="TEXT" CLASS="txtField" NAME="name" SIZE="20" MAXLENGTH="30" VALUE="' + credit-card.card-holder + '" tabindex="5">'. /* 030000 */
   Else
      Return '<INPUT TYPE="TEXT" CLASS="txtField" NAME="name" SIZE="20" MAXLENGTH="30" VALUE="' + v-addr-name + '" tabindex="5">'. /* 030000 */

End Function. /* getCardName() */

Function getCardCountry Returns Char ():

   Def Var v-country As Char No-Undo.

   /************/

   v-country = '<SELECT CLASS="txtField" NAME="country" tabindex="11"'.

   /********************v S010002 v********************/

   If v-disallow-international-addrs Then 
      v-country = v-country + ' disabled'.

   /********************^ S010002 ^********************/

   v-country = v-country + '>~n' + 
               ' <option value=""> </option>~n'.

   For Each country no-lock break by country.country-name:

      v-country = v-country + ' <option value="' + url-encode(country.country,"query") + '"'.

      If available credit-card              and
         credit-card.country eq country.country
      Then
         v-country = v-country + ' selected'.
      else if not available credit-card and
         company.country eq country.country
      then
         v-country = v-country + ' selected'.

      v-country = v-country + '>' + country.country-name + '</option>~n'.

   End. /* for each country */

   v-country = v-country + '</SELECT>'.

   Return v-country.

End Function. /* getCardCountry() */
